Name: Jobtype

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: JobTypes
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":null,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":true,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"Select j.Oid, j.Name, j.Code, j.DurationDays, j.Active ,c.Name as Company, v.Name as Division, 
d.Name as Department from JobType j
Inner Join Company c on j.Company=c.Oid
Inner join Division v on j.Division=v.Oid
Inner join Department d on j.Department=d.Oid
where j.GCRecord IS NULL","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
